00093 /*
00094  * \brief ZCL Commissioning Cluster commands defining macros
00095  */
00096 
00097 #define ZCL_DEFINE_COMMISSIONING_CLUSTER_COMMANDS(getGroupIdentifiersInd, getEndpointListInd, \
00098         endpointInformationResponseInd, getGroupIdentifiersResponseInd, getEndpointListResponseInd) \
00099     DEFINE_COMMAND(getGroupIdentifiersCommand, 0x41, COMMAND_OPTIONS(CLIENT_TO_SERVER, ZCL_THERE_IS_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK), getGroupIdentifiersInd), \
00100     DEFINE_COMMAND(getEndpointListCommand, 0x42, COMMAND_OPTIONS(CLIENT_TO_SERVER, ZCL_THERE_IS_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK), getEndpointListInd), \
00101     DEFINE_COMMAND(endpointInformationCommand, 0x40, COMMAND_OPTIONS(SERVER_TO_CLIENT, ZCL_THERE_IS_NO_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK), endpointInformationResponseInd), \
00102     DEFINE_COMMAND(getGroupIdentifiersResponseCommand, 0x41, COMMAND_OPTIONS(SERVER_TO_CLIENT, ZCL_THERE_IS_NO_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK), getGroupIdentifiersResponseInd), \
00103     DEFINE_COMMAND(getEndpointListResponseCommand, 0x42, COMMAND_OPTIONS(SERVER_TO_CLIENT, ZCL_THERE_IS_NO_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK), getEndpointListResponseInd)

00106 #define COMMISSIONING_CLUSTER_ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands) \
00107   { \
00108     .id = ZLL_COMMISSIONING_CLUSTER_ID, \
00109     .options = {.type = ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE, .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY}, \
00110     .attributesAmount = ZCL_COMMISSIONING_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT, \
00111     .attributes = (uint8_t *)clattributes, \
00112     .commandsAmount = ZCL_COMMISSIONING_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00113     .commands = (uint8_t *)clcommands \
00114   }
00115 
00116 #define COMMISSIONING_CLUSTER_ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands) \
00117   { \
00118     .id = ZLL_COMMISSIONING_CLUSTER_ID, \
00119     .options = {.type = ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE, .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY}, \
00120     .attributesAmount = ZCL_COMMISSIONING_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT, \
00121     .attributes = (uint8_t *)clattributes, \
00122     .commandsAmount = ZCL_COMMISSIONING_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00123     .commands = (uint8_t *)clcommands \
00124   }
